get.summary: Get list of courses with pagination and optional filtering
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of courses with optional filtering by title, category, or instructor.

post.description: Create a new course with its modules, lessons, and tags. Course tags are optional and can be used to categorize courses.

get.summary: Get list of courses by teacher ID
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of courses created by a specific teacher with optional filtering.

get.summary: Get course details by ID for guest users
get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific course by its ID, including modules and lessons, accessible to guest users.

put.description: Update an existing course (only course details, not modules or lessons)

get.summary: Get course details by ID for lectures
get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific course by its ID, including modules and lessons, accessible to lectures.

put.summary: Update multiple modules in a course
put.description: Update multiple modules in a course with its Objectives and Lessons

get.summary: Check if current user is enrolled in a course
get.description: Check if the authenticated user is enrolled in the specified course

put.summary: Update a module within a course
put.description: Update a module within a course, including its objectives and lessons

JWT_Token.description: Copy this into the value field: Bearer {token}
JWT_Token.name: Authorization
